en.name: Drawbread
en.effect:
If you have a monster in your GY: Pay 200 LP; draw 1 card and show it, then if it is a monster, apply this effect based on its Attribute.
● Different from the monsters in your GY: Draw 1 card.
● Same as a monster in your GY: Discard 1 card.
You can only activate 1 "Drawbread" per turn.
